languages.text: Кропотливая работа техножрецов и архивариусов все длится и длится. Даже хормейстер астропатов присоединяется к делу, подолгу пребывая в трансе и рассылая сообщения тем, кто может помочь. Результат, однако, оказывается ошеломителен.

traits.locale_text: Кропотливая работа техножрецов и архивариусов все длится и длится. Даже ваш астропат, почтеннейший Заккари Вайс, присоединяется к делу, подолгу пребывая в трансе и рассылая сообщения тем, кто может помочь. Результат, однако, оказывается ошеломителен.

languages.text: The meticulous work of the Tech-Priests and archivists is taking forever. Even your Astropathic Choirmaster joins the effort, spending long hours in a trance and relaying messages to those who can help. But when the result comes, it is astounding.
languages.original_text: Кропотливая работа техножрецов и архивариусов все длится и длится. Даже хормейстер астропатов присоединяется к делу, подолгу пребывая в трансе и рассылая сообщения тем, кто может помочь. Результат, однако, оказывается ошеломителен.

traits.locale_text: The meticulous work of the Tech-Priests and archivists is taking forever. Even your Astropathic Choirmaster joins the effort, spending long hours in a trance and relaying messages to those who can help. But when the result comes, it is astounding.

The meticulous work of the Tech-Priests and archivists is taking forever. Even your astropath, the esteemed Zacchary Weisz, volunteers to assist the project, spending long hours in trance to deliver the messages to the ones who can help. But when the result comes, it is astounding.

The meticulous work of the Tech-Priests and archivists is taking forever. Even your Astropathic Choirmaster joins the effort, spending long hours in a trance and relaying messages to those who can help. But when the result comes, it is astounding.

The meticulous work of the Tech-Priests and archivists is taking forever. Even your Astropath, the esteemed Zacchary Weisz, volunteers to assist in the project, spending long hours in trance and relaying messages to those who can help. But when the result comes, it is astounding.

The meticulous work of the Tech-Priests and archivists is taking forever. Even your Astropathic Choirmaster joins the effort, spending long hours in a trance and relaying messages to those who can help. But when the result comes, it is astounding.

The meticulous work of the Tech-Priests and archivists is taking forever. Even your Astropathic Choirmaster joins the effort, spending long hours in a trance and relaying messages to those who can help. But when the result comes, it is astounding.

The meticulous work of the Tech-Priests and archivists is taking forever. Even your Astropathic Choirmaster joins the effort, spending long hours in a trance and relaying messages to those who can help. But when the result comes, it is astounding.

The meticulous work of the Tech-Priests and archivists is taking forever. Even your Astropathic Choirmaster joins the effort, spending long hours in a trance and relaying messages to those who can help. But when the result comes, it is astounding.

languages.text: 技术神甫和档案员的细致工作似乎永远无法结束，就连星语唱诗班的唱诗大师也自愿协助这个项目。他在恍惚状态度过了很久很久，帮助需要的人传递信息。当结果出来时，所有人都震惊不已。
languages.original_text: The meticulous work of the Tech-Priests and archivists is taking forever. Even your Astropathic Choirmaster joins the effort, spending long hours in a trance and relaying messages to those who can help. But when the result comes, it is astounding.

traits.locale_text: 技术神甫和档案员的细致工作似乎永远无法结束，就连星语唱诗班的唱诗大师也自愿协助这个项目。他在恍惚状态度过了很久很久，帮助需要的人传递信息。当结果出来时，所有人都震惊不已。

languages.text: 技術司祭とアーキビストの入念な作業には気が遠くなるほどの時間がかかる。あの感応通信官のクワイアーマスターも手を貸して、何時間もトランス状態になり、手を差し伸べてくれる人たちにメッセージを送った。しかし、その結果に驚愕することになる。
languages.original_text: The meticulous work of the Tech-Priests and archivists is taking forever. Even your Astropathic Choirmaster joins the effort, spending long hours in a trance and relaying messages to those who can help. But when the result comes, it is astounding.

traits.locale_text: 技術司祭とアーキビストの入念な作業には気が遠くなるほどの時間がかかる。あの感応通信官のクワイアーマスターも手を貸して、何時間もトランス状態になり、手を差し伸べてくれる人たちにメッセージを送った。しかし、その結果に驚愕することになる。

languages.text: El meticuloso trabajo de los tecnosacerdotes y archivistas se está eternizando. Incluso el maestro del Coro de Astrópatas se ofrece voluntario para ayudar en la labor, pasando largas horas en trance y transmitiendo mensajes a quienes pueden ayudar. Pero cuando obtiene el resultado, es asombroso.
languages.original_text: The meticulous work of the Tech-Priests and archivists is taking forever. Even your Astropathic Choirmaster joins the effort, spending long hours in a trance and relaying messages to those who can help. But when the result comes, it is astounding.

traits.locale_text: El meticuloso trabajo de los tecnosacerdotes y archivistas se está eternizando. Incluso el maestro del Coro de Astrópatas se ofrece voluntario para ayudar en la labor, pasando largas horas en trance y transmitiendo mensajes a quienes pueden ayudar. Pero cuando obtiene el resultado, es asombroso.

languages.text: Die penible Arbeit der Techpriester und Archivare dauert eine Ewigkeit. Selbst dein astropathischer Chormeister bringt sich ein. Er verbringt viele Stunden in Trance und sendet Nachrichten an mögliche Helfer. Das Ergebnis ist allerdings erstaunlich.
languages.original_text: The meticulous work of the Tech-Priests and archivists is taking forever. Even your Astropathic Choirmaster joins the effort, spending long hours in a trance and relaying messages to those who can help. But when the result comes, it is astounding.

traits.locale_text: Die penible Arbeit der Techpriester und Archivare dauert eine Ewigkeit. Selbst dein astropathischer Chormeister bringt sich ein. Er verbringt viele Stunden in Trance und sendet Nachrichten an mögliche Helfer. Das Ergebnis ist allerdings erstaunlich.

languages.text: Le travail méticuleux des technoprêtres et archivistes s'éternise au point que votre maître du chœur astopathique lui-même se joint à eux et passe de longues heures en transe à relayer des messages à tous ceux qui sont susceptibles de vous éclairer. Mais quand le résultat tombe enfin, il s'avère stupéfiant.
languages.original_text: The meticulous work of the Tech-Priests and archivists is taking forever. Even your Astropathic Choirmaster joins the effort, spending long hours in a trance and relaying messages to those who can help. But when the result comes, it is astounding.

traits.locale_text: Le travail méticuleux des technoprêtres et archivistes s'éternise au point que votre maître du chœur astopathique lui-même se joint à eux et passe de longues heures en transe à relayer des messages à tous ceux qui sont susceptibles de vous éclairer. Mais quand le résultat tombe enfin, il s'avère stupéfiant.

languages.text: Tekno Rahiplerin ve arşivcilerin titiz çalışması çok zaman alıyor. Saygın Astropatın Zacchary Weisz bile projeye yardım etmeye gönüllü olup saatlerce transa girerek yardımcı olabilecek herkese mesaj iletiyor. Sonunda sonuç alındığında ortaya çıkanlar hayret verici.
languages.original_text: The meticulous work of the Tech-Priests and archivists is taking forever. Even your Astropathic Choirmaster joins the effort, spending long hours in a trance and relaying messages to those who can help. But when the result comes, it is astounding.
